product_name: Eagle Creek RFID Universal Traveler Daypack
long_description: Carry your laptop and tablet with greater peace of mind when you travel using the Eagle Creek RFID Universal Traveler Daypack. Features Eagle Creek's All Ways Secure(TM) system, which has an RFID blocker to help prevent ID theft, plus lockable self-repairing zippers and reflectivity for visibility. Checkpoint-friendly laptop compartment opens butterfly-style and has padded, e-fleece-lined sleeves for a 17 in. laptop as well as a tablet. Zippered e-fleece stretch pocket on backpack strap holds a phone. Internal organization includes slip pockets for documents, e-fleece slip pocket, zippered pocket, pen slot and key fob. Exterior side zippered pocket and side mesh elasticized pocket stash items quickly. Breathable mesh back panel adds comfort; compression straps stabilize the load; daisy chains let you clip on gear. Ergonomically contoured Air Mesh shoulder straps have an adjustable sternum strap; waist strap can tuck away. Back slip panel lets you slide the Eagle Creek RFID Universal Traveler Daypack over the handle of your wheeled luggage.
short_description: Carry your laptop and tablet with greater peace of mind when you travel using the Eagle Creek RFID Universal Traveler Daypack.
